name: Village Saga
description:
Welcome to Village Saga! Inside the game, you’re going to have much more fun clicking and collecting the cubes to gain plenty of rewards!

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Click at least 2 cubes of the same color to collect
2. Collect enough cubes to meet the target amount with limited moves
3. Use different boosters to collect the cubes more efficiently
4. Spin for good luck to multiple your rewards

GAME FEATURES:
1. Easy to play yet tricky to master
2. No time limit! Feel free to play at your own speed!
3. Beautiful UI graphics and lovely character images
4. Pass the levels and get the chance to collect more rewards

Join Village Saga to enjoy the endless fun!
